description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Assault Ops: Warzone takes the military action of its predecessor into first-person view, adding a new urban environment, day/night lighting, and headshots! Team up with your friends and compete online for the top of the global scoreboards.
description.short: Assault Ops: Warzone takes the military action of its predecessor into first-person view, adding a new urban environment, day/night lighting, and headshots! Team up with your friends and compete online for the top of the global scoreboards.
